name: Rose (DanTheDevGames)
description:
A Two Player Strategy game in active development.
Defeat your enemy by Summoning Soldiers, Traps and Mages.
Control the battle strength of you army, but beware the cost it takes on your Leader.

Right click to select and move
Left click to summon or use Magic.

The game basically works as follows

  • Both players start with a leader each and 50 health.
  • Each turn a leader can move 1 space in any direction in NSWE.
  • Each turn the leader can summon 1 Soldier, Trap or Magician  on any neighbour cell including diagonally.
  • The leader can set the summoning cost of each soldier at the sacrifice of that much health. 
  • The soldier then summons with that health. Health also doubles as soldier attack.
  • Traps are always summoned as cost of 3, but are hidden to your opponent
  • Magicians are always summoned as a cost of 4.
  • Each Terrain has a different bonus and the maps are procedural each match.
  • Traps will explode on damage and change the terrain.
  • Magicians can target 2,3 and 4 cells in any direction, and deal 2 damage, but take 3 damage in return.
  • The goal is to defend your leader from enemy attacks.
  • An attack on your leader will do direct damage. 
  • An attack on your soldiers will result in both taking damage. With death occurring at 0.
  • If you don't summon on a turn, your leader takes 1 damage.

Still in active development with many updates to come.
